author: STEPHEN WADE AP Sports Writer
title: Tokyo Olympics could cut 'extras' in face of soaring costs
description: Tokyo Olympic organizers and the International Olympic Committee will try to cut many of the extras out of next year's postponed games
content:
TOKYO -- 
Tokyo Olympic organizers and the IOC said Thursday they will cut some of the extras out of next years postponed games, an attempt to limit what is expected to be billions of dollars in added expenses.
